Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Ne balia bakhaya nibayingana khubimanyisio biefu, obo nibo Abandu bomumulilo, balimenyamwo tsinyanga tsiosi, ne ni amakalushilo amabii muno
Ne amasila kosikosi shiketsanga tawe halali khubunyali bwa Nyasaye, ne usuubila khu Nyasaye alunjisia omwoyo kukwe, ne Nyasaye ni amumanyi muno wabuli eshindu
Ne muloonde amakhuwa ka Nyasaye nende Omurumwa , ne nimuloba Omurumwa wefu ni okhusia butswa oburume bubwe habulafu
Naye ni Nyasaye abulaho owundi owulali ye tawe, ne Abasuubili basiche butswa Nyasaye

Enywe Abasuubila, toto Mubakhasi benyu nende Abana benyu balimwo abasuku benyu, kho mube meso ninabo, ne nimubeela nemwakhaya okhura mumakani, ne mwaleshela toto bwene Nyasaye ni Omulesheli Owobukoosia muno
Toto emiandu chienyu nabaana benyu namatemo, ne Nyasaye ali nende omurungo omukhongo
Ne murie Nyasaye shinga munyalilwa, ne muwulile, mana muloonde ne murusie eshihanwa, nobulayi khumioyo chienyu ne ulia ulekha obwimani bwo mwoyo kukwe, abo nibo babura
Nimwiwosia Nyasaye likofi lilayi, alabametelakhwo ne alabaleshela ebionono, ne Nyasaye ni Omunji wokhupa orio Omwihotselefu
Yamanya akefisile nende akali habulafu, Owamaani Owamachesi muno
